duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and implement innovative strategies and projects in the Command Center Organization within In Home Services.
Collect, model, analyze, report, and present large amounts of data with meticulous attention to detail.
Garner key insights from data and communicate findings to key stakeholders to help make data-driven decisions.
Develop and deliver recommendations for continuous improvement to internal and external field management, executives, and other business partners.
Conduct long-term and short-term data analysis focusing on increasing productivity and lowering fixed and variable costs while improving customer experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree with a focus in Business or related field (Business Administration, Finance, Business Development Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Education); Master's Degree a plus
